In Time magazine front cover of President Clinton greeting Monica Lewinsky in line there is a man with his hand out who looked just like Daniel Ayalon. http://img.timeinc.net/time/magazine/archive/covers/1998/1101980810_400.jpg In the news film footage of President Clinton and Monica's greeting the image of Daniel Ayalon was much clearer. The recent article by Michael Collins Piper the Falwell Confirms Lewinsky Affair Linked To Israeli Lobby Intrigue raises new questions. http://www.rense.com/general69/col.htm If Monica and Daniel Ayalon are in the same line greeting President Clinton than an investigation is needed. Only by reviewing the original video news footage can this be confirmed.

post_info.post_title: Is it Daniel Ayalon hand out behind Monica Lewinsky?

Daniel Ayalon, Israel's Ambassador to the U.S.
 
 Your point?
